T01TD1147E:110a-1: sha ta panytsa sha ti ka n'a ma sya sto tra /
T01TD1147E:110a-3: brgya lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa /
T01TD1147E:110a-4: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1147E:110a-5: gang zhig la ni nyes pa kun //
T01TD1147E:110a-6: gtan nas yong ye mi mnga' zhing //
T01TD1147E:110a-7: gang la'ang rnam pa thams cad du //
T01TD1147E:110a-8: yon tan thams cad gnas gyur pa //
T01TD1147E:110a-9: gal te sems shig yod na ni //
T01TD1147E:110a-10: de nyid la ni skyabs 'gro zhing //
T01TD1147E:110a-11: de bstod de ni bkur ba dang //
T01TD1147E:110a-12: de yi bstan la gnas pa'i rigs //
T01TD1147E:110a-13: thams cad mkhyen pa yon tan kun //
T01TD1147E:110a-14: mnga' la de yang nyam mi mnga' //
T01TD1147E:110a-15: nyes pa bag chags bcas de yang //
T01TD1147E:110a-16: skyob pa gcig pu la mi mnga' //
T01TD1147E:110a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang ni //
T01TD1147E:110a-18: gsung dang thugs kyi phrin las la //
T01TD1147E:110a-19: zhe 'gras gyur pa gang gis kyang //
T01TD1147E:110a-20: chos dang ldan par glags mi rnyed //
T01TD1147E:110a-21: rgya mtshor gnya' shing bu ga ru //
T01TD1147E:110a-22: rus sbal mgrin pa chud pa ltar //
T01TD1147E:110a-23: dam chos dga' ston cher bcas pa'i //
T01TD1147E:110a-24: mi nyid bdag gis thob nas ni //
T01TD1147E:110a-25: mi rtag nyid dang rjes 'brel zhing //
T01TD1147E:110a-26: las kyi klags la dogs bcas pa //
T01TD1147E:110a-27: bdag gi lce 'di nyid kyis go //
T01TD1147E:110a-28: snying po ci phyir blang mi bya //
T01TD1147E:110a-29: de ltar thub pa'i yon tan kyi //
T01TD1147E:110a-30: yul lta grangs med shes mod kyi//
T01TD1147E:110a-31: rang gi don la gus pa yis //
T01TD1147E:110a-32: de yi phyogs gcig bsgribs te brjod //
T01TD1147E:110a-33: gang gi yon tan grangs dag dang //
T01TD1147E:110a-34: mthu la thug pa ma mchis la //
T01TD1147E:110a-35: rmad byung phrin las dpag med can //
T01TD1147E:110a-36: rang byung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01TD1147E:110a-37: 'di snyed bgyi ba'i mtha' med na //
T01TD1147E:110b-0: 'di ltar lags zhes @110b ci zhig smos //
T01TD1147E:110b-1: khyod kyi yon tan slad du bdag / bsod nams snyam nas spyi brtol skyes //
T01TD1147E:110b-2: bstod pa gleng bslang ba ste le'u dang po'o /
T01TD1147E:110b-4: // / spyod dam mi spyod snyam pa yi //
T01TD1147E:110b-5: rnam par rtog pa rnams spangs nas //
T01TD1147E:110b-7: khyod bdag nyid kyis zhal gyis bzhes //
T01TD1147E:110b-8: khyod ni ma bcol lags mdzad pa //
T01TD1147E:110b-9: khyod ni rgyu med bzhin du byams //
T01TD1147E:110b-10: khyod ni ma 'dris mdza' bshes te //
T01TD1147E:110b-12: nyid kyi sha yang stsol mdzad na //
T01TD1147E:110b-13: dngos po gzhan lta smos ci 'tshal //
T01TD1147E:110b-14: legs mdzad khyod kyis srog kyang ni /
T01TD1147E:110b-15: slong ba'i skye bo rnams la btang //
T01TD1147E:110b-16: nyid kyi sku dang srog dag gis //
T01TD1147E:110b-17: lus can gshed mas zin rnams kyi //
T01TD1147E:110b-18: lus dang srog kyang khyod kyis ni //
T01TD1147E:110b-19: lan brgya phrag du bslu ba mdzad //
T01TD1147E:110b-20: ngan 'gros bsnyengs slad ma lags la //
T01TD1147E:110b-21: bzhed pa'i 'gro ba'ang sgrub ma lags //
T01TD1147E:110b-22: dgongs pa dag pa 'ba' zhig gis //
T01TD1147E:110b-23: khyod kyis tshul khrims goms par mdzad //
T01TD1147E:110b-24: rtag tu gya gyu rnam spangs shing //
T01TD1147E:110b-25: drang brtan rnams ni rtag bsten pas //
T01TD1147E:110b-26: yongs su dag pa'i las rnams kyis //
T01TD1147E:110b-27: khyod ni gzhi rten gcig pur gyur //
T01TD1147E:110b-28: sdug bsngal mang pos gzir ba na //
T01TD1147E:110b-29: khyed kyis dge ba'i thugs kyis ni //
T01TD1147E:110b-30: nyon mongs rnams la sran btsugs nas /
T01TD1147E:110b-31: skye bo nyon mongs can la brtse //
T01TD1147E:110b-32: khyod kyis gzhan gyi don slad du /
T01TD1147E:110b-33: sku srog btang nas dgyes gyur gang //
T01TD1147E:110b-35: sos pa rnam la'ang byung ma gyur //
T01TD1147E:110b-36: khyod ni lan 'ga' ma lags par //
T01TD1147E:110b-37: gtubs kyang sdug bsngal mi dgongs par //
T01TD1147E:110b-38: gshed pa ma bgyid pa'i sems can la'ang //
T01TD1147E:110b-39: gtso bo thugs rjer gyur pa gang //
T01TD1147E:110b-40: khyod kyi thugs ni rin po che //
T01TD1147E:110b-41: rdzogs pa'i byang chub sa bon te //
T01TD1147E:110b-42: dpa' khyod kho nas snying por mkhyen //
T01TD1147E:110b-43: de gzhan skye bos 'ol mi mchi //
T01TD1147E:110b-44: dka' spyad las ni ma bgyis par //
T01TD1147E:110b-46: de slad nyid la'ang ma gzigs par //
T01TD1147E:110b-47: khyod kyi brtson 'grus legs par spel //
T01TD1147E:110b-48: khyad par 'phags par bgyi ba la //
T01TD1147E:110b-49: khyod la thang lhod 'ga' ma byung //
T01TD1147E:110b-50: de slad khyod kyi khyad par rnams //
T01TD1147E:111a-0: @111a * // thog drung rim pa dbyer ma mchis //
T01TD1147E:111a-1: thugs ni thugs rje chen po dang //
T01TD1147E:111a-2: rtag tu rjes su 'brel slad du //
T01TD1147E:111a-4: shin tu bde la'ang khyod ma chags //
T01TD1147E:111a-5: gzhan dang thun mong ma lags pa'i //
T01TD1147E:111a-6: bde ba gang de gya nom yang //
T01TD1147E:111a-7: dam pa'i spyod ldan khyod 'dra la //
T01TD1147E:111a-8: gnod par bas kyi sman ma mchis //
T01TD1147E:111a-9: 'dres pa las ni legs bshad nyid //
T01TD1147E:111a-10: snying po skyon med nyi tshe zhig / khyod kyis kun bzhes thugs la bzhag / nyes bshad dug bzhin yongs su spangs //
T01TD1147E:111a-11: rin chen snying po mkhyen khyod kyis //
T01TD1147E:111a-12: legs bshad srog gis 'jal ba na //
T01TD1147E:111a-13: skye ba de dang de dag tu //
T01TD1147E:111a-14: byang chub slad du dpa' rtsal bstan //
T01TD1147E:111a-15: de slad grangs med gsum dag tu //
T01TD1147E:111a-16: khyod ni de ltar brtson pa na //
T01TD1147E:111a-18: go 'phang bla na med pa brnyes //
T01TD1147E:111a-19: rgyu la bstod pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o /
T01TD1147E:111a-21: // / mtho la phrag dog mi mdzad cing //
T01TD1147E:111a-22: dma' la rngan can mi mdzad la //
T01TD1147E:111a-23: mnyam la 'gran pa mi mnga' bas //
T01TD1147E:111a-24: khyod ni 'jig rten gtso bor gyur //
T01TD1147E:111a-25: khyod ni yon tan rgyu rnams la //
T01TD1147E:111a-26: mngon bgyis 'bras bu rnams la min //
T01TD1147E:111a-27: yang dag sgrub pa de nyid kyis //
T01TD1147E:111a-28: khyod kyi yon tan pha mthar phyin //
T01TD1147E:111a-29: ji ltar khyod kyi zhabs rdul yang //
T01TD1147E:111a-30: bsod nams skye ba mched 'gyur ba //
T01TD1147E:111a-31: de ltar khyod kyis legs spyad pas //
T01TD1147E:111a-32: bdag nyid rab tu bskrun pa mdzad //
T01TD1147E:111a-33: nyes pa nyams smad rtsa nas bton //
T01TD1147E:111a-34: yon tan spel nas rnam par sbyangs //
T01TD1147E:111a-35: gzhung lugs bzang po des na khyod //
T01TD1147E:111a-36: grub mchog lhag par brnyes pa lags //
T01TD1147E:111a-37: ji ltar bdag gi rgyud la de //
T01TD1147E:111a-38: bag chags lhag ma'ang ma lus pa //
T01TD1147E:111a-39: de ltar rnam par thams cad du //
T01TD1147E:111a-40: nyes pa khyod kyis rab tu bcom //
T01TD1147E:111a-41: ji ltar gzhan la de dag dang //
T01TD1147E:111a-42: 'dra ba tsam yang mi gda' ba //
T01TD1147E:111a-43: de ltar khyod kyis bsags bsags nas //
T01TD1147E:111a-44: bdag nyid la ni yon tan bsgrubs //
T01TD1147E:111a-45: 'jig rten pa yi dpe dngos kun //
T01TD1147E:111a-46: gegs bgyid pa dang sgrib pa can //
T01TD1147E:111a-47: re zhig pa dang nyi tshe ba //
T01TD1147E:111a-48: shin tu rnyed par sra ba lags //
T01TD1147E:111a-49: khyod kyis yon tan bla med la //
T01TD1147E:111b-0: gegs bgyid @111b ma mchis rtogs ma mchis //
T01TD1147E:111b-1: brtan pa dang ni rgyun chags pas //
T01TD1147E:111b-2: dpe lta mchis par ga la 'gyur //
T01TD1147E:111b-3: gang tshe khyod kyi dgongs pa'i dkyil //
T01TD1147E:111b-4: gting dang pha rol med brtags na //
T01TD1147E:111b-5: rgya mtsho zab pa nyid kyang ni //
T01TD1147E:111b-6: gnag rjes lta bur sa ler gda' //
T01TD1147E:111b-7: chos rnams kun gyis mi bskyod pa //
T01TD1147E:111b-8: khyod kyi brtan pa mngon bsams na //
T01TD1147E:111b-9: sa yi brtan pa nyid kyang ni //
T01TD1147E:111b-10: shir sha'i ge sar rtse ltar chung //
T01TD1147E:111b-11: thub pa khyod kyi ye shes kyi //
T01TD1147E:111b-12: snang bas mi shes rab rib dag /'joms pa'i thad na nyi ma yang //
T01TD1147E:111b-13: me khyer tsam du'ang mi spyod do //
T01TD1147E:111b-14: khyod kyi gsung thugs mdzad spyod rnams //
T01TD1147E:111b-15: dag pa'i gan na ston zla dang //
T01TD1147E:111b-16: chu dang nam mkha'i dag pa rnams //
T01TD1147E:111b-17: dri ma can ni lta bur gda' //
T01TD1147E:111b-18: 'jig rten legs pa gang ci'ang rung //
T01TD1147E:111b-19: thams cad bsngos na'ang der bas te //
T01TD1147E:111b-20: nyon mongs 'jig rten chos rnams kyis //
T01TD1147E:111b-21: sangs rgyas chos la khyad mi khor //
T01TD1147E:111b-22: rin chen chos gang brnyes nas khyod //
T01TD1147E:111b-23: mchog tu gyur pa de nyid dang //
T01TD1147E:111b-24: khyad du bsgrun zhing de dang ni //
T01TD1147E:111b-25: khyod dang bsgrun ldom kho nar bas //
T01TD1147E:111b-26: gang la spyi tsam bstun nas ni //
T01TD1147E:111b-27: cung zad brjod par bgyid pa de //
T01TD1147E:111b-28: smra ba po yi rang dga' dang //
T01TD1147E:111b-29: thabs dang gcam bu tsam du bas //
T01TD1147E:111b-30: dpe med pa la bstod pa ste le'u gsum pa'o /
T01TD1147E:111b-32: // / khyod ni bdud las rnam rgyal te //
T01TD1147E:111b-33: 'gro kun dad par mdzad pa yang //
T01TD1147E:111b-34: bdag gis chos nyid rjes bsams na //
T01TD1147E:111b-35: chen po ltar gang ma mthong ngo //
T01TD1147E:111b-36: sdang bas rgol bar rtsol byed pa //
T01TD1147E:111b-37: mang po'ang gzhom par bya ba ni //
T01TD1147E:111b-38: khyad par gnas la brten pa yi //
T01TD1147E:111b-39: bzod pa'i tshigs su mtshar mi che //
T01TD1147E:111b-40: gang tshe bdud rnams mngon btul ba //
T01TD1147E:111b-41: de yi nub mo kho na la //
T01TD1147E:111b-42: nyon mongs shin tu che spangs pa //
T01TD1147E:111b-43: de nyid rmad du byung ba lags //
T01TD1147E:111b-44: 'od zer phreng ba stong ldan pa'i //
T01TD1147E:111b-45: nyi mas mun bsal gang lags dang //
T01TD1147E:111b-46: dpa' bo khyod kyis mu stegs las //
T01TD1147E:111b-47: rgyal bar mdzad pa ci zhig mtshar //
T01TD1147E:111b-48: 'dod chags bral bas chags bcas dang //
T01TD1147E:111b-49: zhe sdang bral bas zhe sdang can //
T01TD1147E:111b-50: gti mug bral bas rmongs pa ste //
T01TD1147E:111b-51: gsum pos rtag tu gsum dag btul //
T01TD1147E:111b-52: dam chos rab tu bstod pa dang //
T01TD1147E:111b-53: dam chos ma lags smod mdzad kyang //
T01TD1147E:111b-54: dam pa dag dang tha ma la //
T01TD1147E:112a-0: @112a * // khyod ni chags dang khro mi mnga' //
T01TD1147E:112a-1: dgra bcom pa dang mu stegs la //
T01TD1147E:112a-2: rjes su chags dang khong khro bar //
T01TD1147E:112a-3: khyod kyi thugs ni mi 'gyur na /
T01TD1147E:112a-4: khyod la bstod du ci zhig mchis //
T01TD1147E:112a-5: yon tan rnams la'ang ma chags la //
T01TD1147E:112a-6: yon tan can la'ang bzhed mi mnga' //
T01TD1147E:112a-7: kye ma'o khyod kyi thugs stobs ni //
T01TD1147E:112a-8: rab dang yongs su dag pa lags //
T01TD1147E:112a-9: dbang po rnams ni rab dang ba //
T01TD1147E:112a-10: dus rnams rtag tu mi nyams pas //
T01TD1147E:112a-11: khyod thugs rtag tu dang ba dag / mngon sum gyur pa bzhin du gda' //
T01TD1147E:112a-12: rang bzhin dam pa legs gsungs dang //
T01TD1147E:112a-13: mdzad spyod bzang pos bsgrags pas na //
T01TD1147E:112a-14: khyod kyi blo gros dgongs pa dag / rnam dag byis pa'i bar la grags //
T01TD1147E:112a-15: rmad du byung ba'i bstod pa ste le'u bzhi pa'o /
T01TD1147E:112a-17: // / nye bar zhi la yid du 'ong //
T01TD1147E:112a-18: 'bar la gnod pa mdzad mi mnga' //
T01TD1147E:112a-19: dul la rngom brjid che ba yis //
T01TD1147E:112a-20: sku 'dis su zhig dad mi mdzad //
T01TD1147E:112a-21: khyod kyi sku de gang gis na //
T01TD1147E:112a-22: lan brgyar mthong dang gang zhig gis //
T01TD1147E:112a-23: dang por mthong ba de gnyis ka //
T01TD1147E:112a-24: 'dra bar mig ni mgu bar mdzad //
T01TD1147E:112a-25: khyod kyi sku ni mdzes pa'i phyir //
T01TD1147E:112a-26: blta bas mi ngoms rang bzhin pas //
T01TD1147E:112a-27: mthong ngo cog ni phyi phyir zhing //
T01TD1147E:112a-28: dga' ba bskyed par mdzad pa lags //
T01TD1147E:112a-29: rten gyi yon tan dag dang ni //
T01TD1147E:112a-30: brten pa'i yon tan phan tshun du //
T01TD1147E:112a-31: 'tsham pas khyod kyi sku dang ni //
T01TD1147E:112a-32: yon tan phun tshogs mchog dang ldan //
T01TD1147E:112a-33: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang 'bar ba //
T01TD1147E:112a-34: khyod kyi sku las ma gtogs pa //
T01TD1147E:112a-35: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan 'di ;
T01TD1147E:112a-36: / gzhan gang zhig la legs gnas 'gyur //
T01TD1147E:112a-37: khyod sku rten pa'i yon tan la //
T01TD1147E:112a-38: nga dpal che zhes gsung gsung ltar //
T01TD1147E:112a-39: de yi yon tan rnams kyang slar //
T01TD1147E:112a-40: des legs bkod ces gsungs pa 'dra //
T01TD1147E:112a-41: sku la bstod pa ste le'u lnga pa'o //
T01TD1147E:112a-43: khyad med nyon mongs rnams kyis bcings //
T01TD1147E:112a-44: khyod ni 'gro ba'i nyon mongs dag / dgrol slad yun ring thugs rjes bsdams //
T01TD1147E:112a-45: dang por khyod la phyag bgyi'am //
T01TD1147E:112a-47: skyon mkhyen yun ring de lta bur //
T01TD1147E:112b-0: bzhugs mdzad thugs rje @112b che la bgyi //
T01TD1147E:112b-1: dben pa'i bde ba spang gyur khyod //
T01TD1147E:112b-2: mang po'i nang du bzhugs pa gang //
T01TD1147E:112b-3: de khyod thugs rjes dus 'das pa //
T01TD1147E:112b-4: glags shig thod nas bgyis par bas //
T01TD1147E:112b-5: rig pa yis ni mtsho nang nas //
T01TD1147E:112b-6: klu bzhin khyod kyi thugs rje yis //
T01TD1147E:112b-7: dgon pa zhi gnas grong gi mthar //
T01TD1147E:112b-8: gdul ba'i don gyi slad du drangs //
T01TD1147E:112b-9: nyer zhi mchog la gnas bzhin du //
T01TD1147E:112b-10: thugs rje gtso dang ldan pas na //
T01TD1147E:112b-11: rol mo mkhan gyi sgyu rtsal yang //
T01TD1147E:112b-12: khyod kyi zhabs kyi 'dor bar mdzad //
T01TD1147E:112b-13: rdzu 'phrul seng ge'i sgra dang ni //
T01TD1147E:112b-14: nyid kyis yon tan brjod pa gang //
T01TD1147E:112b-15: de ni bzhed spyod mi mnga' ba //
T01TD1147E:112b-16: khyod kyi thugs rjes bstan pa lags //
T01TD1147E:112b-17: gzhan gyi don du rab bzang gi //
T01TD1147E:112b-18: nyid kyi don la brtse med pas //
T01TD1147E:112b-19: mgon po khyod nyid 'ba' zhig la //
T01TD1147E:112b-20: thugs rjes thugs rje mdzad ma gyur //
T01TD1147E:112b-22: gzhan don bsgrubs mdzad slad du //
T01TD1147E:112b-23: khyod ni lan brgyar phyogs dag tu //
T01TD1147E:112b-24: gtor ma bzhin du btang ba lags //
T01TD1147E:112b-25: de ltar khyod la gnod mdzad kyang //
T01TD1147E:112b-26: nongs pa can du mi rtsi bas //
T01TD1147E:112b-27: khyod kyi bzhed pa kho na dang //
T01TD1147E:112b-28: mthun 'jug pa ni lags par gda' //
T01TD1147E:112b-29: thugs la bstod pa ste le'u drug pa'o /
T01TD1147E:112b-31: // / tshig bzang ba dang don che dang //
T01TD1147E:112b-32: bden pa dang ni snyam pa dang //
T01TD1147E:112b-33: zab gsal gnyis ka'i don ldan dang //
T01TD1147E:112b-34: bsdus dang spros pa dang ldan pa //
T01TD1147E:112b-35: khyod kyi gsung ni de lta bu //
T01TD1147E:112b-36: khyod kyi dgra bos thos na yang //
T01TD1147E:112b-37: thams cad mkhyen pa lags so zhes //
T01TD1147E:112b-38: su zhig jes pa skye mi 'gyur //
T01TD1147E:112b-39: mang po ril gyis snyan pa lags //
T01TD1147E:112b-40: bcos ma 'ga' tsam snyan pa lags //
T01TD1147E:112b-41: khyod kyi gsung don grub pas kyang //
T01TD1147E:112b-42: thams cad legs gsungs kho na lags //
T01TD1147E:112b-43: khyod kyi gsung ni rnam brtags na //
T01TD1147E:112b-44: gang zhig 'jam dang rtsub pa dang //
T01TD1147E:112b-45: gang yang de gnyis ldan pa dag / thams cad ro gcig nyid du 'gyur //
T01TD1147E:112b-46: ae ma'o shin tu yongs dag pa'i //
T01TD1147E:112b-47: phrin las rnams kyang rab tu bzo //
T01TD1147E:112b-48: de yis rin chen gsung rnams kyi //
T01TD1147E:112b-50: khyod zhal blta na rab sdug pa //
T01TD1147E:112b-51: de las mnyan na snyan pa yi //
T01TD1147E:112b-52: gsung 'di dag ni zla ba las //
T01TD1147E:112b-53: bdud rtsi 'dzag pa bzhin du gda' //
T01TD1147E:112b-54: khyod kyi gsung ni 'dod chags kyi //
T01TD1147E:113a-2: zhe sdang sprul ni gdon pa'i phyir //
T01TD1147E:113a-3: nam mkha' lding dang 'dra ba lags //
T01TD1147E:113a-4: yang dang yang du mi shes pa'i //
T01TD1147E:113a-6: nga rgyal ri bo mngon 'joms pas //
T01TD1147E:113a-7: brgya byin mtshon cha 'dra ba lags //
T01TD1147E:113a-8: don gzigs pas ni mi slu ba //
T01TD1147E:113a-9: nongs mi mnga' phyir rjes su mthun //
T01TD1147E:113a-10: legs par sbyar bas ge sla ste //
T01TD1147E:113a-11: khyod kyi gsung ni legs gsum ldan //
T01TD1147E:113a-12: re zhig dang por khyod kyi gsung //
T01TD1147E:113a-13: nyan pa rnams kyi yid 'phrog mdzad //
T01TD1147E:113a-14: de nas yid la bsam bgyis na //
T01TD1147E:113a-15: rdul dang mun pa dag kyang sel //
T01TD1147E:113a-16: phongs pa rnams kyi dbugs 'byin cing //
T01TD1147E:113a-17: bag med rnams ni skrag par mdzad //
T01TD1147E:113a-18: bde ba can dag skyo bgyid pas //
T01TD1147E:113a-19: khyod gsung kun dang 'tsham par 'jug / mkhas pa rnams kyi dga' ba skyed //
T01TD1147E:113a-20: bar ma rnams kyi blo yang spel //
T01TD1147E:113a-21: tha ma'i rab rib rnam 'joms pas //
T01TD1147E:113a-22: gsung 'di skye bo kun la sman //
T01TD1147E:113a-23: lta ba dag las dgar mdzad cing //
T01TD1147E:113a-25: nyes pa sel mdzad khyod kyi gsung //
T01TD1147E:113a-26: yon tan rnams kyi char yang 'bebs //
T01TD1147E:113a-27: kun la ma thogs thugs mnga' zhing //
T01TD1147E:113a-28: dgongs pa'ang kun du nyer gnas pas //
T01TD1147E:113a-29: de slad khyod kyis lung bstan kun //
T01TD1147E:113a-30: thams cad la yang slu mi mnga' //
T01TD1147E:113a-31: gang slad yul min dus min dang //
T01TD1147E:113a-32: snod min rnams su mi 'jug pa //
T01TD1147E:113a-33: de slad khyod gsung don mchis te //
T01TD1147E:113a-34: brtson 'grus legs par brtsams pa bzhin //
T01TD1147E:113a-35: gsung la bstod pa ste le'u bdun pa'o /
T01TD1147E:113a-38: // / bgrod pa gcig dang thabs bde dang //
T01TD1147E:113a-39: legs par 'brel dang nyes pa med //
T01TD1147E:113a-40: thog ma bar dang mthar dge bas //
T01TD1147E:113a-41: khyod kyi bstan 'dra gzhan la med //
T01TD1147E:113a-42: khyod kyi gzhung lugs de lta bu //
T01TD1147E:113a-43: gcig pu phangs la lta chags pas //
T01TD1147E:113a-44: byis pa gal te smod bgyid nas //
T01TD1147E:113a-45: lta dang 'dra ba'i dgra ma mchis //
T01TD1147E:113a-46: gzhan ni 'gro ba'i don slad du //
T01TD1147E:113a-47: sdug bsngal mang bstar gang lags pa //
T01TD1147E:113a-48: de bsams khyod bstan ngan na yang //
T01TD1147E:113a-49: gnas par bgyi ba la thug na //
T01TD1147E:113a-50: phan pa gsung zhing phan mdzad pa //
T01TD1147E:113a-51: khyod kyi bstan pa ci smos te //
T01TD1147E:113a-52: mgo la zhugs ni 'bar bas kyang //
T01TD1147E:113b-0: ci yi @113b slad du sgrub mi bgyid //
T01TD1147E:113b-1: khyod kyi bstan pas rang dbang dang //
T01TD1147E:113b-2: byang chub bde dang zhi ba dang //
T01TD1147E:113b-3: khyod kyi yon tan bsngags pa dang //
T01TD1147E:113b-4: legs pa bzhi po 'di kun thob //
T01TD1147E:113b-5: dpa' bo khyod kyi bstan pa 'di //
T01TD1147E:113b-6: mu stegs thams cad skrag mdzad la //
T01TD1147E:113b-7: bdud ni sems khong chud mdzad cing //
T01TD1147E:113b-8: lha dang mi rnams dbugs kyang 'byin //
T01TD1147E:113b-9: 'chi bdag bstan pa khams gsum gyi //
T01TD1147E:113b-10: sa chen dag na spyod bgyid pa //
T01TD1147E:113b-11: mi thogs bzlog pa ma mchis pa'ang //
T01TD1147E:113b-12: khyod kyi bstan pas zil gyis mnan //
T01TD1147E:113b-13: khyod kyi bstan pa'i lugs 'tshal ba //
T01TD1147E:113b-14: dga' na bskal par yang gnas la //
T01TD1147E:113b-15: gang du bdud kyis mi rdzi ba //
T01TD1147E:113b-16: der yang dga' mgur rab tu mchi //
T01TD1147E:113b-17: lung gi don ni bsam pa dang //
T01TD1147E:113b-18: bsgom dang gus par mnyan pa yi //
T01TD1147E:113b-19: dus gsum cha dbye khyod kyi ni //
T01TD1147E:113b-20: bstan las gzhan la mchis ma lags //
T01TD1147E:113b-21: drang srong skyes mchog khyod kyi bstan //
T01TD1147E:113b-22: de ltar legs pas khyab 'di la //
T01TD1147E:113b-23: ma gus gang lags de las ni //
T01TD1147E:113b-24: sdug bsngal chen po'ang ci zhig mchis //
T01TD1147E:113b-25: bstan pa la bstod pa ste le'u brgyad pa'o /
T01TD1147E:113b-27: // / khyod thos pas ni spro ba skye //
T01TD1147E:113b-28: mthong bas dad pa skye bar 'gyur //
T01TD1147E:113b-29: khyod gsung thos pas dga' 'gyur te //
T01TD1147E:113b-30: bstan pas rnam par grol bar mdzad //
T01TD1147E:113b-31: khyod kyi sras kyis mgu bar 'gyur //
T01TD1147E:113b-32: 'phel bas skye dgu rnams kyang dga' //
T01TD1147E:113b-33: gshegs pa na ni phan 'dogs mdzad //
T01TD1147E:113b-34: ldog pa na ni rgud par 'gyur //
T01TD1147E:113b-35: bsgrags pas sdig pa 'phrog par mdzad //
T01TD1147E:113b-36: khyod dran pas ni rangs par 'gyur //
T01TD1147E:113b-37: btsal bas blo gros skye 'gyur te //
T01TD1147E:113b-38: yongs su shes pas rnam par 'dag / khyod la bsu bas dpal du byed //
T01TD1147E:113b-39: bsten pas blo gros mchog tu 'gyur //
T01TD1147E:113b-40: bsten na 'jigs pa med par mdzad //
T01TD1147E:113b-41: bsnyen bkur bgyis pas bde bar 'gyur //
T01TD1147E:113b-42: tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pas dag / bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pas dang //
T01TD1147E:113b-43: shes rab phun tshogs mi 'khrugs pas //
T01TD1147E:113b-44: khyod ni bsod nams mtsho chen lags //
T01TD1147E:113b-45: khyod sku bltar 'os rin chen te //
T01TD1147E:113b-46: legs gsungs mnyan 'os rin chen lags //
T01TD1147E:113b-47: chos ni spyad 'os rin chen pas //
T01TD1147E:113b-48: khyod ni rin chen 'byung gnas lags //
T01TD1147E:113b-49: khyod ni chu bos bdas pa'i gling //
T01TD1147E:114a-2: srid pa'i 'jigs pas nyen pa'i skyabs //
T01TD1147E:114a-4: tshul khrims dag phyir snod kyi mchog / zhing gshin 'bras bu phun sum tshogs //
T01TD1147E:114a-5: srog chags kun la phan mdzad phyir //
T01TD1147E:114a-6: grogs kyi phul yang khyod lags so //
T01TD1147E:114a-7: phan 'dogs mdzad pas mdza' bshes te //
T01TD1147E:114a-8: 'grogs na bde phyir snying du sdug / zhi phyir gcig tu yid du 'ong //
T01TD1147E:114a-9: yon tan kun mnga' mchod 'os khyod //
T01TD1147E:114a-10: sdig pa med pas yid dang 'thad //
T01TD1147E:114a-11: sku gsung bzang bas dga' bar mdzad //
T01TD1147E:114a-12: don kun 'grub phyir dpal yangs te //
T01TD1147E:114a-13: yon tan legs rten bkra shis lags //
T01TD1147E:114a-14: smon lam la bstod pa ste le'u dgu pa'o /
T01TD1147E:114a-16: // / khyod ni rngan then bgyid la skul //
T01TD1147E:114a-17: chom rkun bgyid pa tshar yang gcod //
T01TD1147E:114a-18: gya gyu can rnams rnal du 'god //
T01TD1147E:114a-19: dal bus bgyid la gzhen skul 'debs //
T01TD1147E:114a-20: dul ba rnams ni lam la sbyor //
T01TD1147E:114a-21: dmu rgod rnams la btang snyoms mdzad //
T01TD1147E:114a-22: de slad skyes bu 'dul ba yi //
T01TD1147E:114a-23: kha lo sgyur ba bla med mchog / khyod ni nyam thag rnams la brtse //
T01TD1147E:114a-24: bde bar gnas la phan par dgyes //
T01TD1147E:114a-25: phongs par gnas la thugs rje bas //
T01TD1147E:114a-26: kun la phan par bzhed pa lags //
T01TD1147E:114a-27: khyod ni dgra bo rnams la'ang byams //
T01TD1147E:114a-28: nyams par gyur la phan 'dogs mdzad //
T01TD1147E:114a-29: gtum po rnams la thugs brtse bas //
T01TD1147E:114a-30: khyod ni ya rabs rmad cig lags //
T01TD1147E:114a-31: phan 'dogs bgyid slad pha ma dag / gal te bla mar 'tshal na go //
T01TD1147E:114a-32: khyod ni lhag par phan 'dogs pas //
T01TD1147E:114a-33: bla ma nyid gyur smos ci 'tshal //
T01TD1147E:114a-34: rang gi don la mi lta bas //
T01TD1147E:114a-35: nyid kyi dgra bo ltar gyur cing //
T01TD1147E:114a-36: g-yang sa'i mun na gnas rnams la //
T01TD1147E:114a-37: ra ba lta bur gyur pa'ang khyod //
T01TD1147E:114a-38: 'jig rten gnyis kar sman gdags dang //
T01TD1147E:114a-40: mun par gyur pa'i 'jig rten la //
T01TD1147E:114a-41: khyod kyis shes rab snang bar mdzad //
T01TD1147E:114a-42: yul la nye bar spyod pa na //
T01TD1147E:114a-43: lha mi'i spyod pa tha dad kyang //
T01TD1147E:114a-44: chos kyi longs spyod thun mong bas //
T01TD1147E:114a-45: khyod la dbye ba mi mnga'o //
T01TD1147E:114a-46: bcom ldan khyod kyis skye ba dang //
T01TD1147E:114a-47: na tshod rigs dang yul dang ni //
T01TD1147E:114b-0: dus kyi skyon @114b med chos rnams kyis //
T01TD1147E:114b-1: 'di dag kun la sman yon btags //
T01TD1147E:114b-2: khyod kyi nyan thos srid bral zhing //
T01TD1147E:114b-3: ya mtshan 'dzin pa med rnams la'ang //
T01TD1147E:114b-4: lha rnams thal sbyar smon bgyid cing //
T01TD1147E:114b-5: ya mtshan che ba lta bur mchod //
T01TD1147E:114b-6: ae ma'o sangs rgyas 'khor ba yi //
T01TD1147E:114b-7: nyid gur gyur pa byung ba brjid //
T01TD1147E:114b-8: des ni mi yang lha rnams kyis //
T01TD1147E:114b-9: smon par bya ba nyid du gyur //
T01TD1147E:114b-10: lam la 'jug pa la bstod pa ste le'u bcu pa'o /
T01TD1147E:114b-12: // / mnyel dang zhe bde nyams gyur dang //
T01TD1147E:114b-13: skye bo ngan dang 'grogs pa dang //
T01TD1147E:114b-14: mi mthun pa dang mang po yi //
T01TD1147E:114b-15: skyon yang yon tan bzhin dgongs shing ;
T01TD1147E:114b-16: /'gro ba'i don slad ma chags pa'i //
T01TD1147E:114b-17: thugs kyis brtson pa gang mdzad pa //
T01TD1147E:114b-18: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi //
T01TD1147E:114b-19: chos nyid bcom ldan de rmad do //
T01TD1147E:114b-20: bshos kyang phal pa gsol mdzad cing /
T01TD1147E:114b-21: res 'ga' smyung ba dag kyang mdzad //
T01TD1147E:114b-22: nyam nga'i shul du'ang gshegs mdzad cing //
T01TD1147E:114b-23: rad rod can du'ang mnan la mdzad //
T01TD1147E:114b-24: mgon khyod gtso bor gyur lags kyang //
T01TD1147E:114b-25: gdul bya rnams la byams slad du //
T01TD1147E:114b-26: sku ngas brngo dang gcam tshul dang //
T01TD1147E:114b-27: skad dang cha lugs sgyur ba'ang mdzad //
T01TD1147E:114b-28: kun gyis dga' mgur rang don phyir //
T01TD1147E:114b-29: bran bzhin bskor bar bsgrims pa las //
T01TD1147E:114b-30: mgon khyod rtag tu bdag nyid la //
T01TD1147E:114b-31: mnga' ma mchis pa'ang ma lags so //
T01TD1147E:114b-32: khyod la gang dang gang du yang //
T01TD1147E:114b-33: ji skad bskul ba'ang mi spong ste //
T01TD1147E:114b-34: nyid kyi sgrub pa bzang po las //
T01TD1147E:114b-36: ji ltar khyod ni gnod bgyid la //
T01TD1147E:114b-37: phan pa lhur mdzad de lta bur //
T01TD1147E:114b-38: skye bo dag ni phan bgyid la'ang //
T01TD1147E:114b-39: phan pa de ltar lhur mi bgyid //
T01TD1147E:114b-40: khyod ni gnod bgyid dgra bo la //
T01TD1147E:114b-41: phan pa mdzad pa'i bshes lags te //
T01TD1147E:114b-42: rtag tu skyon dag tshol ba la //
T01TD1147E:114b-43: yon tan 'ba' zhig tshol ba lags //
T01TD1147E:114b-44: khyod ni gang na dug bcas shing //
T01TD1147E:114b-45: zhugs dang bcas par spyan drangs pa //
T01TD1147E:114b-46: der ni brtser bcas gshegs pa dang //
T01TD1147E:114b-47: khyod la bdud rtsi can du gyur //
T01TD1147E:114b-48: bzod pas mi snyan brjod pa dang //
T01TD1147E:114b-49: 'khu ba dag ni bde legs kyis //
T01TD1147E:114b-50: mi snyan smra la bden pas te //
T01TD1147E:114b-51: khyod kyis sdang ba byams pas btul //
T01TD1147E:114b-52: thog ma med dus goms pa yis //
T01TD1147E:115a-2: khyod kyis ngan song rnam bzlog nas //
T01TD1147E:115a-3: skad cig nyid la yongs su bsgyur //
T01TD1147E:115a-4: dka' ba mdzad pa bstod pa ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o /
T01TD1147E:115a-6: // / rtsub pa dang 'jam bgyis pa dang //
T01TD1147E:115a-7: 'jungs pa rnams ni gtong phod dang //
T01TD1147E:115a-8: gtum pa des par bgyis pa gang //
T01TD1147E:115a-9: de ni khyod kyi thabs mkhas lags //
T01TD1147E:115a-10: dga' bo'i dbang po nyer zhi dang //
T01TD1147E:115a-11: nga rgyal khengs pa 'dud pa dang //
T01TD1147E:115a-12: sor mo'i phreng ba'ang zhi bgyis na //
T01TD1147E:115a-13: su zhig ngo mtshar bskyed mi bgyid //
T01TD1147E:115a-14: khyod kyi chos kyi ros tshim pas //
T01TD1147E:115a-15: gser las bgyis pa'i lam spangs nas ;
T01TD1147E:115a-16: / ran mang bting ba'i gnas mal du //
T01TD1147E:115a-17: brten rnams bsod nyams nyal bar bgyid //
T01TD1147E:115a-18: khyod kyis dus dang bsam mkhyen pas //
T01TD1147E:115a-19: res 'ga' zhus na'ang mi gsung la //
T01TD1147E:115a-20: spros gyur gzhan la bstan pa dang //
T01TD1147E:115a-21: drung du gshegs nas bshad pa'ang mdzad //
T01TD1147E:115a-22: dri med gos la tshon bzhin du //
T01TD1147E:115a-23: thog mar sbyin sogs gtam dag gis //
T01TD1147E:115a-24: sems la spro ba bskyed nas ni //
T01TD1147E:115a-25: phyi nas chos ni bstan pa mdzad //
T01TD1147E:115a-26: 'khor ba mi bzad gting nas ni //
T01TD1147E:115a-27: 'gro ba nyon mongs drang slad du //
T01TD1147E:115a-28: khyod kyis gang zhig ma stsal ba'i //
T01TD1147E:115a-29: thabs dang spyod pa de ma mchis //
T01TD1147E:115a-30: sku yi cha lugs rnam mang dang //
T01TD1147E:115a-31: gsung gis so so'i skad bzhin du //
T01TD1147E:115a-32: gdul bya'i bsam pa tha dad pa //
T01TD1147E:115a-33: de dang der ni khyod kyis mdzad //
T01TD1147E:115a-34: de dag kun kyang dag pa dang //
T01TD1147E:115a-36: brjid dang lha mi rnams la ni //
T01TD1147E:115a-37: sman 'dogs bkur ba sha stag lags //
T01TD1147E:115a-38: smra dang bgyid pa phal cher ni //
T01TD1147E:115a-39: legs par rdo thogs ma lags kyi //
T01TD1147E:115a-40: bden par gsung ba khyod la ni //
T01TD1147E:115a-41: de gnyis gzhan du gda' ba lags //
T01TD1147E:115a-42: bdag nyid dag pa 'ba' zhig gis //
T01TD1147E:115a-43: khyod kyis 'gro ba'i dpal zhing mdzad //
T01TD1147E:115a-45: 'jig rten gsum na mchis ma lags //
T01TD1147E:115a-46: thog med srid pa nyam nga bar //
T01TD1147E:115a-47: snga nas gcig tu nyams pa yi //
T01TD1147E:115a-48: sems can kun la sman slad du //
T01TD1147E:115a-49: khyod ni de ltar brtson pa lags //
T01TD1147E:115a-50: mkhas pa la bstod pa le'u bcu gnyis pa'o /
T01TD1147E:115a-52: // / gang gis khyod drin lan lon pa'i //
T01TD1147E:115b-0: sgrub de mchis @115b snyam mi bgyid de //
T01TD1147E:115b-1: skye bo gang dag mya ngan 'das //
T01TD1147E:115b-2: de dag gis kyang lan ma lon //
T01TD1147E:115b-3: khyod kyi chos la gnas de dag / rang don kho na bgyid par bas //
T01TD1147E:115b-4: de yi slad du 'o brgyal gang //
T01TD1147E:115b-5: de la lan go ci zhig lon //
T01TD1147E:115b-6: khyod ni sems can gnyid log pa'i //
T01TD1147E:115b-7: rgyud la gzigs pa'i zhugs tse ba //
T01TD1147E:115b-8: bag med gyur pa rnams kyi ni //
T01TD1147E:115b-9: grogs bzang bag dang bcas pa lags //
T01TD1147E:115b-10: khyod kyis nyon mongs gzhom pa bshad //
T01TD1147E:115b-11: bdud kyi g-yo dag bstan pa mdzad //
T01TD1147E:115b-12: 'khor ba'i rang bzhin mi bzad brjod //
T01TD1147E:115b-13: 'jigs pa med pa'i phyogs kyang bstan //
T01TD1147E:115b-14: phan dgongs thugs rje can gyis ni //
T01TD1147E:115b-15: sems can rnams la bgyi 'tshal ba //
T01TD1147E:115b-16: gang zhig khyod kyis ma mdzad pa //
T01TD1147E:115b-17: gzhan go ci zhig mchis lags kye //
T01TD1147E:115b-18: gal te chos ni 'di dag dang //
T01TD1147E:115b-19: spo ba zhig tu btub na ni //
T01TD1147E:115b-20: gdon mi 'tshal bar khyod kyis ni //
T01TD1147E:115b-21: lha sbyin la brten kun la'ang stsol //
T01TD1147E:115b-22: de slad 'gro la brda sprod pa //
T01TD1147E:115b-23: 'gro ba'i mgon po khyod kyis ni /
T01TD1147E:115b-24: 'di na phan tshun byed pa po //
T01TD1147E:115b-25: med pa skad du nges par gsungs //
T01TD1147E:115b-26: 'jig rten rnams la thugs brtse bas //
T01TD1147E:115b-27: yun rings sa stengs dam chos bshad //
T01TD1147E:115b-29: slob ma dam pa'ang mang du bskrun //
T01TD1147E:115b-30: mngon du gdul bya'i tshogs kyang ni //
T01TD1147E:115b-31: mdzes bzangs yan chad btul lags pas //
T01TD1147E:115b-32: da go khyod la sems can gyi //
T01TD1147E:115b-33: bu lon lhag ma ci mchis na //
T01TD1147E:115b-35: sku gdung til 'bru bzhin blags nas //
T01TD1147E:115b-36: mjug tu'ang khyod kyis shin tu ni //
T01TD1147E:115b-37: dka' spyad yal bar ma dor ro //
T01TD1147E:115b-38: gzugs kyi sku dang chos 'di dag / gzhan don kho nar mdzad do zhes //
T01TD1147E:115b-40: khyod kyis mya ngan 'das pa bstan //
T01TD1147E:115b-41: de slad chos sku ma lus pa //
T01TD1147E:115b-42: sras kyi mchog la gtad mdzad de //
T01TD1147E:115b-43: gzugs sku til 'bru ltar bshig nas //
T01TD1147E:115b-44: khyod ni yongs su mya ngan 'das //
T01TD1147E:115b-45: ae ma'o gnas pa ae ma'o tshul //
T01TD1147E:115b-46: ae ma'o yon tan ae ma'o sku //
T01TD1147E:115b-47: sangs rgyas kyi ni chos rnams la //
T01TD1147E:115b-48: ya mtshan mi che 'ga' ma mchis //
T01TD1147E:115b-49: phan 'dogs mdzad cing blta na sdug / sku gsung phrin las zhi gyur pa //
T01TD1147E:116a-2: rmongs pa mi bzad pa la gzigs //
T01TD1147E:116a-3: bsod nams rgya mtsho rin chen gter //
T01TD1147E:116a-4: yon tan 'byung gnas chos kyi tshogs //
T01TD1147E:116a-5: khyod la sems can gang 'dud pa //
T01TD1147E:116a-6: de dag la yang phyag 'tshal legs //
T01TD1147E:116a-7: mgon khyod yon tan mi bas kyang //
T01TD1147E:116a-8: bdag gi zho sha bas 'tshal bas //
T01TD1147E:116a-9: des na 'jigs pa mchis slad du //
T01TD1147E:116a-10: glo ba la ni bcags bzhin mchis //
T01TD1147E:116a-11: khyod kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid //
T01TD1147E:116a-12: tshad ma mchis la bsam mi khyab //
T01TD1147E:116a-13: bstan min grangs kyang ma mchis pa //
T01TD1147E:116a-14: khyod bdag nyid kyis mkhyen lags grang //
T01TD1147E:116a-15: mtsho chen chab ni bas par ma gyur kyang //
T01TD1147E:116a-16: skye bo'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bgyid ltar //
T01TD1147E:116a-17: khyod kyi yon tan cha tsam ma bsgrags kyang //
T01TD1147E:116a-18: bdag ni mchog tu glo pa dga' zhing mchis //
T01TD1147E:116a-19: bdag gis thub la dad pas spobs skyes pa'i //
T01TD1147E:116a-20: dge ba'i las 'di'i 'bras bu 'khrungs pa yis //
T01TD1147E:116a-21: ngan rtog rlung dmar 'tshubs pas dkrugs pa yi //
T01TD1147E:116a-22: 'gro ba'i sems ni rnal du gnas par shog / bu lon med par bstod pa ste le'u bcu gsum pa'o /
T01TD1147E:116a-24: // / brgya lnga bcu pa'i bstod pa slob dpon mkhas pa chen po bram ze rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T01TD1147E:116a-26: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shr'i shraddha ka ra wa rmma dang /
T01TD1147E:116a-27: lo ts'a sh'akya blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
